Private solutions

In competitive markets with complex business processes, the winner is the one who is able to inspire trust through transparency amongst their partners.

Our mission

Smart implementation of blockchain redefines the trust we place in each other, making interactions more transparent, fair and reliable. This is why we will impact on the World Happiness Index, giving everyone access to knowledge, integrating developing countries into the global economy and  bringing joy to people’s lives.

Leadership

Leadership in innovations makes an impact on a global scale. Multicultural, multidisciplinary and diverse top-management allows Apla to speak in one language with worldwide leaders from prime ministers to CIOs.

Our leaders eat last. Creating a workplace of the future: bureaucracy free, with a greater purpose, based on constant learning and individuality at its core.

Oleg
Strelenko

Founder/CTO
Oleg is an expert in computer sciences with more than 10 years of professional experience in programming and managing IT projects.
Oleg is an expert in computer sciences with more than 10 years of professional experience in programming and managing IT projects. He was leading the team to develop the new coding languages for the blockchain platform called «Symvolio» & «Ptotypo». The team of Apla programmers under the Oleg’s leadership is ready to launch the original blockchain platform after 6 years of hard work. Oleg studied at the Saint - Petersburg State Marine Technical University. He is known in the blockchain community as one of the leading IT professionals.

Vitaly
Bondar

Chief Executive Officer/Legal
Vitaly specializes in e-commerce and private international law matters.
Vitaly specializes in e-commerce and private international law matters. Over the past 15 years, he has held senior positions at large international law firms and industrial companies with a focus on cross-border mergers and acquisitions, and transaction structuring. Vitaly holds a postgraduate diploma (L.L.M) in International Banking and Commercial Law in 2001 from Queen Mary University in London.

Jesus
Pena-Garcia

COO
Jesus is a blockchain enthusiast, serial entrepreneur and cybersecurity expert with more than 10 years of experience in the IT field.
Jesus is a blockchain enthusiast, serial entrepreneur and cybersecurity expert with more than 10 years of experience in the IT field. He is heading the Grant Thornton Technology HUB in Luxembourg and Founder/CEO of Bitvalley SARL. Jesus worked for the Spanish Ministry of Defence and homeland security as a cybersecurity expert in the Centro Nacional de Inteligencia (Spanish National Intelligence Service). He holds a BSC in Computer Sciences and BTS diploma in Electronics Engineering.

Bruck

CMO

Chris can be described as a Media Entrepreneur and Global Top 100 Brand-Image Marketing Executive, Innovator, and his interest is International Business Development. As a top digital strategist and innovator, he initiated and led the Global Digital Initiative of Rolex from 2005 to 2009. Chris holds a Ph.D. in Business and Commerce as well as a J.D in International Law.

In addition, he has been a Board member of The Association of Bankers & Banks of мLuxembourg for 15 years, and a member of the ABBL negotiation committee for 10 years, and president of the Banking Academy (IFBL) 12 years.

Michael
Aprossine

Chief Business Development Officer
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur.
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur with more than 20 years’ experience in IT. Extensive industry knowledge and the desire to shake things up compelled Michael to launch a number of online startups from dotcoms to the internet of things and blockchain. An expert in strategic planning and new business model incorporation, Michael is developing Apla partnership programs and attracting customers around the world. He holds an Executive MBA and is a bachelor of Social Science. Worked as a co-founder and CEO of USDC SlotLogic S.A.R.L., as a marketing director at Korston Group, as BDO at FTS Maconomy and Ciscom.

In recent years, he has worked on the creation of a subjectevent approach to complex systems modeling.

Latest news

Blockchain Ecosystem: What is it About?

As the spark of blockchain revolution is engulfing the world, the technology is becoming more sophisticated as the day goes by. Blockchain engineers the world over are putting thought into turning their product into an engineering marvel and such ideas give rise to buzzwords of the day. Getting a hold on these buzzwords becomes imperative for C-level execs as well as investors so that the knowledge remains perceptible and nothing becomes arcane.

Five stages of understanding blockchain

Blockchain can be a tricky subject, but market players are slowly learning about how they can apply this new phenomenon to their business processes. Learning happens in stages; you can’t become a genius overnight. The same is with understanding blockchain. There are a myriad articles out there on the internet about blockchain, all with their own different stance and all based on the knowledge that each writer has when putting pen to paper (more like: fingers to keyboard). However, who really knows what in this wild west of blockchain propaganda?
